title: When is graves going to get a hotfix?

replies.body:
is there an official place we can view hotfixes? The patch notes show there hasn't been a "patch update" since 11/13
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-522-notes#patch-patch-updates
Let me follow up on that, that page should have been updated when the hotfix went out.

Normally when you guys change stuff their is a patch i have to DL and then i have to click the "i agree" button. I have not had to do this when the patch came out

So either the tool tips are all wrong (hope not) or there was no fix.

They can make server-sided changes (such as the ones made yesterday) which don't require a patch and a prompt when you launch.

Patch Updates which require a patch and prompts you when you launch means there were client or client and server-sided changes made. 

Tooltips will be updated in Patch 5.23.
What changes were included in that hotfix?

Wouldn't it be great if we could get this sort of information without having to resort to reddit threads?

(edit: ty nevertheless)
Can y'all maybe put out a client message so we know when they hit?

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AE6mmeAs,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-11-18T18:28:21.784+0000)
>
> Yesterday.

You can see into the past?! Tell me what happens!!
Now tell us when you are hotfixing Yasuo.
The nerf to Warlord's was a nerf to Yasuo and Tryndamere.
